Definition at line 322 of file SGP_Utils.c.

void pmatchc ( char **  elements,
long *  n_elements,
char **  set,
long *  n_set,
long *  matches 
)

finds character elements in a set (n elements) and returns indices - only one (the first) match is reported per element a vector "matches" of length n_elements has to be provided

)

SGP_Utils.c

Created on: 28.07.2009 Author: greilich finds integer (32bit) elements in a set (n elements) and returns indices - only one (the first) match is reported per element a vector "matches" of length n_elements has to be provided
